Package com.exacttarget.etpushsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ETNotificationBuilder
    Helper interface for overriding the notification builder for your notifications
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ETLandingPagePresenter
    Simple activity to load a url into a webview and present it to the user.
    ETLocationManager
    ETLocationManager is responsible for finding an accurate location and retrieving a list of geofences from ExactTarget.
    ETNotifications
    Provide class to customize notifications

    There are three ways to override the default intent that is launched when someone taps on a Push Message received by your app: Use the this class to override the launch intent using ETNotifications.setNotificationLaunchIntent(ETNotificationLaunchIntent) Specify your own activity to handle the notification tap using ETPush.setNotificationRecipientClass(Class).
    ETPush
    JB4A SDK main class for MobilePush actions.
    ETPushConfig
    The configuration used to bootstrap your app to the SDK using ETPush.readyAimFire(ETPushConfig pushConfig).
    ETPushConfig.Builder
    Build a new ETPushConfig instance to bootstrap your app with the SDK.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ETException
    Exception type for errors generated from JB4A SDK
